mapper.select: select B.*, M.member_nick, M.member_badge from board B inner join member M on B.board_id = M.member_id
mapper.insert: insert into board( board_no, board_id, board_title, board_content) values(${boardNo}, #{boardId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent} )
mapper.update: update board set board_title=#{boardTitle}, board_content=#{boardContent}, board_edittime=sysdate where board_no = #{boardNo}
update board set board_click=board_click+1 where board_no=#{boardNo}
